nodes.name: buyContent
getById
senderIsBuyer
isExist

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) view external returns (bytes32,bytes32,address,string memory,string memory)

nodes.name: _canBuy
_canBuyAOContent

buyContent(bytes32,uint256,uint256,bytes.details: Bring content in to the requesting node by sending network ions to the contract to pay for the content

params._denomination: The denomination of the network ion, i.e ao, kilo, mega, etc.
params._networkFractionAmount: The fraction amount of network ion to pay
params._networkIntegerAmount: The integer amount of network ion to pay
params._publicAddress: The public address of the request node
params._publicKey: The public key of the request node

getById(bytes32).details: Return purchase receipt info at a given ID

params._purchaseReceiptId: The ID of the purchased content

getById(bytes32).return: The ID of the content hostThe ID of the staked contentThe ID of the contentaddress of the buyerprice of the contentamount paid by AOamount paid by Buyerrequest node's public keyrequest node's public addresscreated on timestamp

isExist(bytes32).details: Check whether or not a purchaseReceiptId exist

params._purchaseReceiptId: The PurchaseReceipt ID to be checked

senderIsBuyer(bytes32,address).details: Check whether or not sender is the buyer of purchase receipt ID

params._purchaseReceiptId: The ID of the Purchase Receipt to be checked

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred
